description: All you need are four ingredients to create this delicious no-bake lemon cheesecake slice.
name: Four Ingredient Lemon Cheesecake Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour over biscuits and smooth down surface. Cover and refrigerate for about two hours or until set. When set, slice and serve.
